column4: I just installed 32bit Ubuntu on my mac, but this macbook is made to run a 64bit kernel, should I install 64 bit Ubuntu instead?
also, how would I go about updating from 32 bit Ubuntu to 64?
you probabaly don't want to install 64 bit ubuntu
first rule says if you've got a system which is working no need to change it. And with 64 bit you won't find much difference anyway
